subject: Football
Collective Bargaining
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: After last year’s lockout, N.F.L. training camps were too condensed to determine whether the new practice rules were helping players, but this year is providing a better snapshot.
snippet: After last year’s lockout, N.F.L. training camps were too condensed to determine whether the new practice rules were helping players, but this year is providing a better snapshot.
